title: New Creator: CPA Proam League
body:
League Socials:
www.cpa2kleague.com
www.twitter.com/CPA2KLeague

Host Socials:
YoungPrecise
https://www.youtube.com/youngprecise
https://twitter.com/ayeePrecise
https://www.twitch.tv/Precise

416
https://twitter.com/416lll
https://www.twitch.tv/416x

Proposed Coin Name: $CPA

Info: CPA Proam League is on a mission to become the most professional and prestigious amateur global NBA 2K Proam League. We have no affiliation with NBA 2K or the NBA 2K League. CPA is a global NBA 2K Proam League open to all levels of competition on Xbox One and PS5 and operates three leagues - North America, Europe and Asia/Australia/New Zealand. Our goal is to create the most professional, prestigious and competitive esport tournaments and leagues by offering a unique experience featuring NBA 2K proam tournaments or leagues!

Use Cases:

-Launch & Distribution-
Coin bonus for first event sign-up - 10 coin bonus for anyone that registers for our first NBA 2K21 event with our creator coin
Coin bonus for every event - 5 coin bonus for anyone that registers for any future events after our first event
Twitter giveaways - Coins will be given away through Twitter giveaways whenever we’re holding registration for an event i.e. 20 randoms winners will be selected to receive 5 $CPAcoins but they must follow, like, and RT @CPA2KLeague 

-Holding Perks-
Free roller events - As the brand grows, we will periodically host free roller tournaments for coin holders
Exclusive experiences - As the brand grows, we will periodically host exclusive experiences for coin holders i.e. free 1-hour coaching from a top NBA 2K player, scouting report from an NBA 2K League scout, etc.
Exclusive content - As the brand grows, we will build our existing Discord channel to host exclusive content for coin holders i.e. weekly player ranking lists, weekly scouting reports, request a personal scouting report, etc.

-Transaction Methods-
$CPA coins will be used for all registrations of our events and in addition, the $CPA coin will be used to conduct a variety of in-season or in-tournament transactions including:
Registration fees - Every tournament and league in North America, Europe & Australia/New Zealand will be transacted with our $CPA coin
Roster changes - Every roster that needs to be adjusted is subject to a roster fee change, this will be transacted in the $CPA coin
Rebranding/management changes - Every roster that needs to be rebranded or a change of management is subject to a management fee charge, this will be transacted in the $CPA coin.
Exclusive experiences - As the brand grows, we will periodically host exclusive experiences for coin holders to pay for i.e. free 1-hour coaching from a top NBA 2K player, scouting report from an NBA 2K League scout, etc.
Exclusive content - As the brand grows, we will build our existing Discord channel to host exclusive content for anyone that buys our coin i.e. weekly player ranking lists, weekly scouting reports, request a personal scouting report, etc.

Grant: $1000

Projected volume: $5000+/mo in tournament registrations & fees from teams

A 'yes' approves this coin, and a $1000 gift coin grant
A no denies this proposal
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
